story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Oh, Ethan? No, I haven’t seen him.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
If you’re looking for him, couldn’t you just
call him?
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I’m not sure if he’s on the phone with
someone or just has bad reception,
but he’s not picking up.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I mean, he’s always suddenly disappearing
on us like this...
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
But he’s gotten even harder to find since the
Arceus Cup began.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Knowing him, he’s probably training
somewhere outrageous again.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You keep getting stronger, Silver, and I can’t
let you one-up me!
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
So I went around the island and trained
a bunch!
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_1600_10: Let’s settle this at the Arceus Cup.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I was looking for you so I could challenge
you officially.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: You’re not gonna turn me down, are you?
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
I’m sure battling in the Arceus Cup will
awaken your arc suit!
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_2400_10: That’s Volo. He’s a great merchant!
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_2500_10:
He delivered food to me even when I was
training deep in the mountains with no
reception!
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Oh, but of course! Nowhere is too far for a
paying customer!
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_2700_10: Wow, Ethan sure knows a lot of people.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_2800_10: Anyway, back to the Arceus Cup!
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Until now, everyone who’s awoken their
arc suit...
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_3000_10:
did so by proving they’d surpassed the limits
of their bond with a partner Pokémon.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_3100_10:
I believe that sort of bond will be the key to
victory this time, too!
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_3200_10:
So...are there any Pokémon you feel a deep
connection to?
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_3300_10: We have to pick just one?
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_3400_10:
That’ll be hard. All my partner Pokémon
have been by my side my whole journey.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_3700_10:
Mine’s gonna be my secret weapon to take
you down.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_4000_10:
A battle with Ethan must really be special
to him.
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_4100_10: I can’t wait for the Arceus Cup!
story_arceus_05_02000/2401_1001_4300_10:
I’ve gotta ramp it up if I’m going up against
Silver!
